title: How to open a blood plasma business - Quora

response.answer_text: Go online and get the Code of Federal Regulations from the FDA website.  If, after reading the regulations, you still think that you want to open a plasma business, you will need to hire someone to develop a business plan.  You will need to determine how much product you plan to produce each year, if you will outsource the testing and manufacture of products or produce them in house, potential customers of your raw plasma or finished product . . . You will also need to scope out your competition and your donor base.  Good luck.  Working with biologics is not easy.
First of all - learn a lot about the law relating to supply of medical products/devices in your country. Thereafter you either learn to do it yourself or you hire people who can run as lab for you.
